name: John Wick Game
description:
This is 'John Wick Game', a new video game from Outhouse Media.
In this action-packed game, a seductive vampire hunter named John Wick is captured by a man who calls himself the vigilante Free Willy. Armed with a customised customised weapon and a hot rod motorcycle, John joins forces with Free Willy to thwart an evil plan to take over the world. Gameplay A unique combat engine that blends classic 2D and 3D graphics, and features a number of specialized moves to reflect an individual's playstyle. Four kinds of effective AC weapons are. 1. Light machine gun: Shot to kill opponents 2. Long rifles: Big enough to kill opponents in one shot 3. Light machine pistol: Shoot and kill 4. Heavy machine pistol: Kill, but low power As a vampire, you move fast, and shoot from a distance. Your attacks follow you through the world, and allow you to reach out for your prey. New weapons New customization schemes include a customisable minigun, a customisable shotgun, a customisable machine gun, and a customisable heavy machine pistol. Innovative attack mechanics Attacks let you use different situations to attack. If you're in a dangerous circumstance or you have allowed a life to be taken by the enemy, you can unleash special moves. These special moves can be used on powerful enemies, or knock one back. In-game animations Killer Eyes
